title: If you're a horse
creator_credit: William Van Horn, Paul B. Foster, Davidson Films and Xerox Publication Films
brief_description: Part of the “Human values series”. This episode shows what happens when a horse that loves to eat apples meets an ogre that loves to eat horses. Encourages examination of the idea of temptation in human values. Suitable for secondary level.
creator_credit_for_label: William Van Horn, Paul B. Foster, Davidson Films and Xerox Publication Films
